lines.text: Who did you expect, Robinson Crusoe?
I don't give a damn whether you think I'm suited to this work or not.
Well said. Well said. There's hope for you yet.

[to Dr. Drager]
I'll bunk in with you. I snore like an elephant but that's your problem.
I take it you don't believe in God.
All I need is a half bottle of gin and a ton of breakfast.
Do you believe in witchcraft and all that nonsense?
Yes, because it exists. And because I believe in the strength of the human spirit.
You don't need me, do you?
